Britain’s first attempt to colonise NZ revealed: Four Hauraki Gulf islands sold 14 years before Treaty of Waitangi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/britains-first-attempt-to-colonise-nz-revealed-four-hauraki-gulf-islands-sold-14-years-before-treaty-of-waitangi/ U2YOJKC2YRHOPKKGUWV2ZUOVV4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/britains-first-attempt-to-colonise-nz-revealed-four-hauraki-gulf-islands-sold-14-years-before-treaty-of-waitangi/ U2YOJKC2YRHOPKKGUWV2ZUOVV4/ Kurt BayerRare document shows sale of four islands in Hauraki Gulf years before Treaty of Waitangi.
